LanguageData.Fluffy.ResearchTree.HoldForClassic: Hold SHIFT to open the vanilla research window
LanguageData.Fluffy.ResearchTree.HoldForNew: Hold SHIFT to open the new research window
LanguageData.Fluffy.ResearchTree.CLClickMoveToFrontOf: Ctrl-Left-Click to move to front of queue
LanguageData.Fluffy.ResearchTree.CLClickAddToFrontOfQ: Ctrl-Left-Click to add to front of queue
LanguageData.Fluffy.ResearchTree.CannotMoveMore: {0} cannot be moved more to the front of the queue than it already is
LanguageData.Fluffy.ResearchTree.NoIdeologyPopupTT: When selecting a research, the popup warning that it will unlock items that your current Ideology does not allow will not be shown
LanguageData.Fluffy.ResearchTree.StorytellerDoesNotAl: Storyteller does not allow this tech
LanguageData.Fluffy.ResearchTree.RimedievalDoesNotAll: Rimedieval settings does not allow this tech
LanguageData.Fluffy.ResearchTree.GrimworldDoesNotAllo: Grimworld study requirement not fulfilled, right click to show detailed info
LanguageData.Fluffy.ResearchTree.SemiRandomResearchLo: Semi Random Research does not allow choosing research freely
LanguageData.Fluffy.ResearchTree.ShowCompletion: Show completion message for finished research
LanguageData.Fluffy.ResearchTree.StillLoading: Tree is loading for the first time, this can take a while
LanguageData.Fluffy.ResearchTree.LoadingWait: Tree not finished generating, click to open vanilla tree
LanguageData.Fluffy.ResearchTree.VanillaGraphics: Use the old graphical methods (if flickering)
LanguageData.Fluffy.ResearchTree.LoadType: When should the research-tree get generated?
LanguageData.Fluffy.ResearchTree.LoadTypeFour: Do not generate research tree, but keep research queue
LanguageData.Fluffy.ResearchTree.CtrlFunctionScroll: Use Ctrl to vertically scroll the research-tree
LanguageData.Fluffy.ResearchTree.CtrlFunctionZoom: Use Ctrl to zoom the research-tree
LanguageData.Fluffy.ResearchTree.ResolutionChange: ResearchTree: Graphic-change detected, research tree will be regenerated
LanguageData.Fluffy.ResearchTree.UIScaleWarning: When using UI scale larger than 1x you may experience research labels getting cut off if using the background loading option. Please use the load on first time opening if you experience this.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ResearchTree.OverrideResearch: Make the research tree as default research tab \n(hold shift for open vanilla)
